body.p:
Western Lunatic Asylum of Ky.,
Hopkinsville, , 186.
Hon J. F, Robinson Govr of Ky

Allow me to present J S, M, Bernard of this city to your excellency, with whom he has business. A favorable consideration of Mr Bernards matter will be a source of gratification to a number of your political friends in Hopkinsville. Mr B is a gentleman eminently worthy of your excellencys kindly offices in his behalf
